titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should urge the United Nations Security Council to promptly adopt an arms embargo against Iran and Iraq.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States should urge the United Nations Security Council to promptly adopt an arms embargo against Iran and Iraq.
